title: Interpretive Pedagogy Workshop for Online Intercultural Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of foundational science and technology terminology and intermediate foreign language proficiency
context.additional_context: A program emphasizing the importance of culturally contextualized communication in non-face-to-face environments for in-service science professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more linguistic misunderstandings arising in cross-cultural communication about scientific topics.
Learners can construct two or more feedback instances that consider peers' cultural backgrounds using an interpretive approach.
Learners can design one or more communication strategies reflecting contextual interpretation in international collaboration scenarios in science.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
